        public UserRequest(android.content.Context applicationContext)

    • Method Detail

      • logout

        public void logout()
            throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new logout request to be send over the network.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • allUserData

        public void allUserData()
                 throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new all user data request to be send over the network.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(String email,
                    String password,
                    String firstname,
                    String lastname,
                    String courseOfStudy,
                    int role,
                    boolean isActive,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                    String imageFileName)
             throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new add user request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        email - The email of the user to.
        password - The password of the user.
        firstname - The first name of the user.
        lastname - The last name of the user.
        courseOfStudy - The course of study of the user.
        role - The role of the user.
        isActive - True if the user should be active.
        image - The image to set as new drone image. Null for no edit
        imageFileName - The name of the image file. Null if image is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(int userId)
                throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new delete user request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • editUser

        public void editUser(int userId,
                     String email,
                     String password,
                     String firstname,
                     String lastname,
                     String courseOfStudy,
                     int role,
                     boolean isActive,
                     android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                     String imageFileName)
              throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new edit user request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user.
        email - The email of the user to.
        password - The password of the user.
        firstname - The first name of the user.
        lastname - The last name of the user.
        courseOfStudy - The course of study of the user.
        role - The role of the user.
        isActive - True if the user should be active.
        image - The image to set as new drone image. Null for no edit
        imageFileName - The name of the image file. Null if image is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • showUser

        public void showUser(int userId)
              throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new show user request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • booleanToInt

        private int booleanToInt(boolean value)
        Parses a boolean into an int.
        Parameters:
        value - A boolean value.
        Returns:
        1 if value is true, 0 otherwise.
